title: The Muscle spindle
creator_contributor_role: John Wiley and Sons, production company

description: This film shows how the electrical impulses produced by movement and tension of a muscle are transmitted to and received from the nervous system. The techniques for isolating a muscle spindle and keeping it alive outside the body are demonstrated.
